mapper.select: SELECT A.ShoppingCartID, A.ItemID, A.CustomerID, A.ShoppingCount, B.ItemCode, B.ItemShortDescriptionCN, B.ItemShortDescriptionEN, C.Cellphone, C.CustomerName, A.Status, (CASE A.Status WHEN 'I' THEN '待支付' WHEN 'D' THEN '已删除' WHEN 'P' THEN '已支付' END) AS StatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM ShoppingCart A INNER JOIN Item B ON A.ItemID = B.ItemID INNER JOIN Customer C ON A.CustomerID = C.CustomerID ORDER BY A.InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.ShoppingCartID, A.ItemID, A.CustomerID, A.ShoppingCount, B.ItemCode, B.ItemShortDescriptionCN, B.ItemShortDescriptionEN, C.Cellphone, C.CustomerName, A.Status, (CASE A.Status WHEN 'I' THEN '待支付' WHEN 'D' THEN '已删除' WHEN 'P' THEN '已支付' END) AS StatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM ShoppingCart A INNER JOIN Item B ON A.ItemID = B.ItemID INNER JOIN Customer C ON A.CustomerID = C.CustomerID WHERE A.CustomerID = #{customerID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.Status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
